title: Tense situation reported near CID
body_lines: A tense situation is reported in front of the headquarters of the Criminal Investigation Department (CID).
A group of protesters from GotaGoGama at the Galle Face Green had commenced a protest this afternoon, demanding the arrest of MP Johnston Fernando.
The parliamentarian arrived at the CID premises earlier today to record a statement on the attack on the anti-government protesters in Colombo on the 9th of May.
